ValidationRule.description: Only users with the permission set Primary Address can modify primary address records
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), NOT($Permission.Primary_Address), Primary__c = TRUE, OR ( ISCHANGED( Street__c ), ISCHANGED( City__c ), ISCHANGED( State__c ), ISCHANGED( Country__c ), ISCHANGED( Zip_Postal_Code__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Sorry, you don't have permission to create or modify a Primary address.
